full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 130 of 247 258 LBUCmax3 Visoski - cross 1 A. That is correct. 2 Q. She bought household items? 3 A. Yes. 4 Q. She decorated the planes, too; right? 5 A. She had a lot put into the airplanes, stocking the airplane on what we carry as far as beverages. 6 Q. We saw photographs of the plane, right, this isn't a matter of hanging a few curtains; right? 8 A. No. 9 Q. This is a pretty big job to outfit one of these planes correctly for their flight? 10 A. Sure. 11 Q. And we also saw these properties; right? They were -- let's talk about the ranch in particular. That was a large piece of property; right? 13 A. A lot of square footage, yes. 14 Q. You said 10,000 acres, roughly? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. It's a pretty big job to manage those properties; right? 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. In particular, just to call out the ranch for a moment, there were animals on that property; right? 20 A. Yes. 21 Q. There were horses in the stables? 22 A. She loved her horses. 23 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011902
